result.eng: The Irish are usually very friendly.
result.ga: bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáth
result.orig: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáth
result.html: bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáthThe Irish are usually very friendly.
result.ponchtml: bíonn na hÉireannaiġ an-ċairdiúil de ġnáṫThe Irish are usually very friendly.

result.eng: We liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.
result.ga: thaitin tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúil
result.orig: Thaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúil
result.html: thaitin tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúilWe liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.
result.ponchtml: ṫaitin tuaisceart na hÉireann linn ḃí muintir na háite an-ċairdiúilWe liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.

result.html: bhí siad an-chairdiúilThey were very friendly.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad an-ċairdiúilThey were very friendly.

result.eng: They were not friendly at all.
result.ga: ní raibh siad cairdiúil ar chor ar bith
result.orig: Ní raibh siad cairdiúil ar chor ar bith
result.html: ní raibh siad cairdiúil ar chor ar bithThey were not friendly at all.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ siad cairdiúil ar ċor ar biṫThey were not friendly at all.
